div.head: Carcanets made Ã jour
div.ab: They are molded like crayfish en noyau, first on one side, that which is hollow being raised up with clay, & then one uncovers them from the other side & one makes the second casting. They can also be cast well in frames, provided that they are released easily. If they are not, one models them in wax, or else one fills the cavities that cannot release with wax or clay.
